label:
This is an in-app notification that is sent to the creator of the news post when someone likes the original news post.
You can insert the following dynamic values:

##ActivityTitle## - Head description of the news post
##CreatedDate## - Date when the like was added
##FullName## - Name of the user who liked the news

template.message: ##FullName## has added a like to your post: ##ActivityTitle##
